name: Blob fight
description:
hi guys!

this is a project I worked on for a pretty  long time now, its a fighting game, played by two people on the same keyboard.

one player with arrow keys and space, the other with WASD and "F". 

your goal - push the other player off the platform. you can punch to knock the other player back, and you can even dash by double tapping on one of the direction keys.

and.. ya, game is really buggy sometimes, but I really wanna move to something else, so..  that's it I think, enjoy!
